name: In Transit (Sean)
description:
More of a salvaged prototype than a game. Recommended use: pick a palette, go fullscreen, hide the buttons, and let the autopilot do its job.

Button functions (top to bottom):

  1. Toggle frame clearing
  2. Swap palette
  3. Fullscreen
  4. Mute
  5. Toggle path visibility
  6. Reset
  7. Toggle button visibility

You can click on planets/stars to temporarily override the autopilot.

Made for the Fermi Paradox Jam with Pixi.js.

Browser support:

  • Chrome, Firefox - works as intended
  • Edge - no audio
  • IE9+, Safari - no audio, performance/refresh/palette swap issues
  • IE<=8 - no support
